Advans Banque Congo S.A., nke a na-akpọkarị Advans Banque, bụ ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa kwụụrụ onwe ya na Democratic Republic of Congo, isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Kinshasa.
Ewebatara Advans Banque Congo na Julaị 2008 wee nye ikike ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa azụmaahịa na Mee 2009 site na Central Bank of Congo.
Na Machị 2020, Proparco gbaziri Advans Banque Congo $3 nde
Ụlọ akụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ịnye ọrụ ego na obere ụlọ ọrụ Kongo, obere na ọkara dị ka ahịa niche ya
Advans Banque na-arụ alaka 10 n'ime obodo anọ nke Congo..

Advans Banque Congo bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị n'etiti Advans SA (nke a maara dị ka itinye ego Lafayette), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego nke edebanyere aha na Luxembourg dị ka onye nwere ọtụtụ òkè na KfW Entwicklungsbank,African Development Bank, International Finance Corporation na Horus Development Finance dị ka ndị nwere obere òkè na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Advans SA na-ezube iguzobe ụlọ ọrụ ego microfinance na akụ na ụba na-apụta
Advans SA nwere ụlọ ọrụ microfinance na Democratic Republic of the Congo, Cameroon, Ghana, Cambodia, Pakistan, Cote d'Ivoire na Tanzania.
